attributes.action: Abolish the Cancer Act of 1939, numerous scientifically proven cures exist(MHRA)
attributes.additional_details:
Food & Drug Administration admits cannabis can kill cancer http://www.cancer.gov/about-cancer/treatment/cam/patient/cannabis-pdq#link/_13

MHRA admits CBD is MEDICINE http://www.gov.uk/government/news/mhra-statement-on-products-containing-cannabidiol-cbd

Cannabinoids as therapeutic agents in cancer http://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pmc/articles/PMC4171598/#__abstractid916790title 

DEATHS fall MJ legal states http://europe.newsweek.com/states-medical-marijuana-painkiller-deaths-drop-25-266577?rm=eu
attributes.background: Although it has been known for decades in certain academic circles, there is now an already huge and growing library of information on the Internet that proves cancer can be cured through using numerous different agents. Examples include THC found in the cannabis plant, mistloe, & the protein GcMAf.
